value: content=It is at 1.650 m. Dated from 13th century – Romanesque style. Every year, on the last Saturday in May happens a pilgrimage with the attendance of most of the people of Sant Julià de Lòria and many from elsewhere in the country. It is obligatory to reserve beforehand.
content=Church dated from 11th century – Romanesque style.  It is outside of Nagol village. It is obligatory to reserve beforehand. Free-guided tours.
hours=From July to August: every day 10AM to 1PM and from 3PM to 6PM. The rest of the year only at mass hours.
content=A museum of tobacco, smoking and smuggling housed in a one-time tobacco factory.
